■Use a meat spatula and the
grey Hutzler spatula for
the teriyaki patties.
■Remove one at a time and
stack four on top of one
another.

■Use a wet wipe to get rid of
meat juice on the spatula
before using it again.
■The maximum number of patties
that can go on the UHC tray
is 16 (4 columns, 4 rows).
